communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oregon Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide records sufficient to show a current staff roster of all sworn employees with your agency.

Please include;
- first and last name of each employee with their corresponding;
- badge number
- employee identification number
- hire date
- rank or position
- assigned duty station/substation/precinct/location
- current salary

This request applies to ALL sworn Department employees, including those at substations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Marcus Boyd

communications.subject: Alabama Open Records Law Request: Alabama Transporation Records
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Project 1: I-10 Mobile River Bridge Design-Build Project
Document Types:
Executed preconstruction and/or design phase contracts
RFP responses from contractors and/or design-build teams
Score sheets (if applicable)
Consultant RFQ responses (if applicable)
Information detailing the legal structure of the proposer/design-builder and principle participants

Project 2: On-Call Independent Cost Estimating Statewide (4/19/2022)
Document Types:
Executed agreements and all associated exhibits with selected cost estimating consultants
Proposals for all responsive consultants

Project 3: I-10 Mobile Bayway Project
Document Types:
Executed preconstruction and/or design phase contracts
RFP responses from contractors and/or design-build teams
Consultant RFQ responses (if applicable)
Score sheets (if applicable)
Information detailing the legal structure of the proposer/design-builder and principle participants

Additional Notes:
For all projects, please include all versions, drafts, and amendments of the above-listed documents.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

André Natta, a citizen of Alabama, in coordination with Bob Smith.
